citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 PM to
3:15 PM on 03/20/2014.
Phone calls went to voice mail-messages left at both numbers.
